column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Darton - Thank you for your review. I'm sorry you didn't like our Crispy Chicken. Please know you can always send back any item that doesn't meet your approval. Or if we happen to serve a dish that is subpar
column2: we want to know immediately so we can fix it or offer something more suited to your liking. As far as the seasoned egg in concerned
column7: we're going to miss the mark every now and then. Again
column8: we are happy to replace these items but we have to know about it. If you search the word "egg" in our 1
column10: you'll see that this statistical aberration is pretty much on point.
